pages.text: $(#734608)Burning$() $(thing)magic-imbued totems$() $(#734608)on an $(item)Altar of Summoning$()$(#734608) calls monsters from beyond. Magic begets magic. The altar cannot be created without the power of a $(item)Mage Table$() $(#734608)and the dark potency of a $(item)Shard of Night.$()$()$()

$(#734608)The$() $(item)Altar of Summoning$() $(#734608)can be built anywhere, but requires delicate setup and is $(#ff0000)not easily transportable.$() $(#734608)It's finnicky and needs a clear, wide space all around it so nothing interferes with the summoning. I wouldn't recommend building one of these cursed things in your house, anyway.$()
